Loss Through Lack of Faith 

     God would have the standard lifted higher and still higher. The church cannot abridge her task without denying her Master. Meetinghouses must be built in many places. Is it economy to fail to provide in our cities places of worship where the Redeemer 
                                                                           280
may meet with His people? Let us not give the impression that we find it too great an expense to provide properly for the reception of the heavenly Guest.
